node.title: Number of Omicron cases in NSW rises to 13 as cluster at western Sydney school grows
node.description: Four new cases of Omicron are confirmed in NSW, including two more students at the Regents Park Christian School, with urgent testing underway on a further 10 COVID-positive students.
node.content:
["Health authorities in NSW fear the Omicron COVID-19 variant is spreading in the community, after a\u00a0COVID-19 cluster at a western Sydney school grew to 13 cases.", "Three of the cases at the Regents Park Christian School\u00a0have been confirmed to be the Omicron variant, and urgent testing is underway on the remaining 10.", "The western Sydney school has now been closed for the rest of the year and all staff and students have been identified as close contacts.\u00a0", "Yesterday\u00a0a student\u00a0who had\u00a0not been overseas and had\u00a0no links to people who had\u00a0travelled abroad\u00a0was confirmed as the school cluster's first Omicron case.", "NSW Health said it was \"urgently investigating the source of infection for this cluster\".", "The Sydney Indoor Climbing Gym at Woodville Road in Villawood was visited by some of the confirmed cases.", "Anyone who was there on Saturday November 27\u00a0between 9:00am and 4.30pm is considered a close contact and must get tested and isolate for seven days.\u00a0", "The total number of Omicron cases in NSW now stands at 13, including two new\u00a0cases in returned travellers.", "Health Minister Brad Hazzard said the outbreak was concerning, as the virus appeared\u00a0to have been transmitted in the community.", "\"I think transmission is always a concern but we\u00a0need to keep it in perspective at the moment,\" he said.", "\"Worldwide, there is not clarity around whether this particular variant is going to cause us anywhere near the problems that the earlier variants caused us.\"", "The two returned travellers who have tested positive for Omicron were the parents of a child who was found to have the new strain after travelling on Qatar Airways flight QR908 from Doha to Sydney on November 23.", "The family had not travelled to southern Africa,\u00a0prompting NSW Health to suspect transmission occurred on the flight.", "A number of venues visited by the family in Chatswood on Sydney's lower north shore have been listed as\u00a0exposure sites.", "Three\u00a0Omicron cases have been identified in passengers on a flight from Singapore to Sydney on November 28.", "Every person who was on the Singapore Airlines flight has been asked to get tested immediately and isolate until they receive a negative result.", "Positive Omicron cases have also been identified in passengers on\u00a0two other Qatar Airways flights from Doha, which landed on November 25 and 27 respectively.", "Research is still being done on the new variant, which was first identified in southern Africa, but yesterday\u00a0Chief Medical Officer Paul Kelly said there was \"no real evidence\" that it was more severe than the Delta variant.", "\"So we remain, I remain, cautiously optimistic, but we need\u00a0further information,\" he said.", "NSW recorded 337 new COVID-19 cases and no deaths in the 24 hours to 8pm yesterday.", "Although this is a higher number than the state has seen for many weeks, Mr Hazzard said it wasn't particularly concerning and was a \"modest\" increase.", "Premier Dominic Perrottet said he was surprised cases weren't higher given the high rate of mobility, and reiterated case numbers were not the ultimate measurement for success.", "\"Hospitalisations and deaths ... they are the\u00a0numbers that matter,\" he said.", "There are currently 140 COVID-19 patients in NSW hospitals, with 24 being treated in intensive care units.", "To date 94.6 per cent of people aged 16 and over have received a first dose of a COVID-19 vaccine, and 92.6 per cent are fully vaccinated.", "Of the people aged 12 to 15, 81.3 per cent have received a first dose of COVID-19 vaccine, and 76.9 per cent are fully vaccinated.", "", "
Heavily mutated Omicron variant puts scientist on alert
"]
